data.eml:eml: New species of Ateuchus and Canthidium (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) from Costa Rica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kohlmann, Bert, Solis, Angel (2009): New species of Ateuchus and Canthidium (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) from Costa Rica. Zootaxa 2219: 31-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190015
